alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 10:21PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lea County through 1045 PM MDT... At 1020 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Jal, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Jal, Jal Airport, Eunice Airport and Oil Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
